#include<bits/stdc++.h>
typedef unsigned long long llu;

using namespace std;
llu n;
void bitrep(llu x)
{
	if (x==0)
		return ;
	bitrep(x>>1);
	printf("%llu",(x&1));
}
int hey (llu x)
{
	int c=0;
	while (x)
	{
		if (x&1)
			c+=2;
		else
			c+=1;
		x>>=1;
	}
	return c-2;
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while (t--)
	{

		scanf("%llu",&n);
		if ((n&(n-1))==0)
		{
			printf("%d\n",hey(n>>1));
			continue;
		}
		llu tmp=n;
		int bits=0,i,j;
		for (;tmp;bits++)
			tmp>>=1;
		int mini=INT_MAX;
		for (i=bits-1;i>=0;i--)
		{
			llu a1=0,a2=0;
			for (j=bits-1;j>=i;j--)
			{
				if (n&(1LLU<<j))
					a1=(a1|(1LLU<<j));
			}
			for (;j>=0;j--)
			{
				if (n&(1LLU<<j))
					a2=(a2|(1LLU<<j));
			}
			int lol=max(hey(a1),hey(a2));
			mini=min(mini,lol);
		}
		printf("%d\n",mini);
	}
	return 0;
}
